metadata.title: CVE-2025-0516 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Authorization in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 17.7prior to 17.7.4, 17.8 prior to 17.8.2 allow users with limited permissionsto perform unauthorized actions on critical project data.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
